name: Organic Superfood Truffles - Raw Organic Pecan Gingerbread with Lucuma
description:
Our limited edition product for the festive season. 

Inspired by a traditional Norwegian family recipe ‘Mørke Pepperkaker’ meaning dark gingerbread, this raw organic pecan gingerbread was created out of a sheer love for the gingerbread experience. With organic pecans, ginger and an exquisite combination of spices, the taste is simply heavenly.

Sweetened only with organic white mulberries and organic medjool dates, not only are these superfood truffles a delicious luxury but they are jam packed with nutrients to make this a naturally healthy snack as well.

name: Organic Superfood Truffles - Choc Hazelnut Vanilla Bean with Maqui Berry
description:
Hazelnut and vanilla are a match made in heaven with these decadently delicious bite-sized truffles. The perfect snack pack for multiple moments of sheer joy.

Wild harvested in Patagonia, Maqui Berry is considered the highest anti-oxidant wholefood on the planet. We’ve infused this with organic raw chocolate, premium superfoods, hazelnuts and ground vanilla beans for a luxurious Swiss chocolate taste.

All of our bite sized Organic Superfood Truffles have been delicately crafted for superior nutrition and delicion from the highest quality raw organic ingredients from Australia and around the world to create the perfect snack pack so that every moment and every bite is filled with joy.

Certified Organic* Ingredients; hazelnuts*, medjool dates*, white mulberries*, cacao butter*, cacao powder*, pepitas*, sunflower seeds*, carob powder*, cashews*, maqui berry*, ground vanilla beans*, cinnamon*, extract of vanilla and himalayan crystal salt.

name: Organic Superfood Truffles - Choc Mint Walnut with Spirulina
description:
These truffles are dedicated to the choc-mint fans! The pure certified organic essential oil of mint entrances the taste buds and satisfies that deep mint longing.

We added spirulina to the mix, a green superfood and one of nature’s richest and most complete sources of nutrition. We then combined this with an exotic array of organic raw premium superfoods, infused it with a raw chocolate mint twist and shaped them into bite sized truffles for the ultimate snack pack.

All our bite sized Organic Superfood Truffles have been delicately crafted for superior nutrition and delicion from the highest quality raw organic ingredients from Australia and around the world to create the perfect snack pack so that every moment and every bite is filled with joy. 

Certified Organic* Ingredients; walnuts*, medjool dates*, white mulberries*, cashews*, cacao powder*, cacao butter*, almonds*, carob powder*, pepitas*, sunflower seeds*, spirulina*, cinnamon*, essential oil of peppermint* and himalayen crystal salt.

name: Organic Superfood Truffles - Sour Cherry Cashew with Cacao Nibs
description:
The sour cherry tang of these truffles combines beautifully with the caramel white mulberries and the added medjool dates provide an extra depth and richness to the flavour.

Cacao, a rich superfood and one of the highest wholefood sources of antioxidants and magnesium in the world, has been added here in the form of the unadulterated cacao nibs for a slight crunch. We’ve combined this with an exotic array of organic raw premium superfoods, infused it with a sour cherry twist and shaped them into bite sized truffles for the ultimate snack pack. 

All of our bite sized Organic Superfood Truffles have been delicately crafted for
superior nutrition and delicion from the highest quality raw organic ingredients from Australia and around the world to create the perfect snack pack so that every moment and every bite is filled with joy.

Certified Organic* Ingredients; white mulberries*, sour cherries*, cashews*,  medjool dates*, cacao nibs*, cacao butter*, pepitas*, sunflower seeds* and almonds*.

name: Organic Superfood Truffles - Sweet Orange Almond Choc with Chia Seeds
description:
These are reminiscent of the sweet orange flavour in Jaffas, except of course we've made this without compromising on our health so we can enjoy the sweet orange chocolate almond flavour and know we're giving ourselves a nutritious kick as well!

Chia seeds are a superfood rich in omega-3 fatty acids, protein, minerals and antioxidants. We’ve combined them with an exotic array of organic raw premium superfoods, infused it with a sweet orange raw chocolate twist and shaped them into bite sized balls for the ultimate snack pack. 

Our bite sized Organic Superfood Truffles have been delicately crafted for superior nutrition and delicion from the highest quality raw organic ingredients from Australia and around the world to create the perfect snack pack so that every moment and every bite is filled with joy.

Certified Organic* Ingredients; almonds*, medjool dates*, white mulberries*, cashews*, cacao butter*, walnuts*, pepitas*, sunflower seeds*, cacao powder*, chia seeds*, carob powder*, cinnamon*, himalayan crystal salt, essential oil of sweet orange.

name: 100% Organic Beeswax Cacao Leather Balm - Premium Leather Care and Protection
description:
The ancient Greeks used beeswax to waterproof and weatherproof their ships. We’ve added organic raw cacao butter and biodynamic raw olive oil to not only protect, but to moisturise and care for your leather products so they retain their original beauty throughout their life - without any of the fumes or chemicals. 

This product was created for those who want to look after their leather in the best way possible without the fumes and chemicals common to leather care products.

This is a pure, 100% organic product that's so good you can put it on your skin!

name: Biodynamic Premium Rolled Oats
description:
These Biodynamic Premium Rolled Oats are grown
by the Mason family in Western Australia and have not been stabilised which means they have not been subject to steam before being rolled. This retains the rich nutrients, high vitamin content and the beneficial enzymes that are found naturally in oats. 

Oats are an excellent source of iron, thiamine and dietary fibre and have a higher concentration of well-balanced protein than other cereals. Research has shown that oats are great for the heart and support a healthy cardiovascular system, 
containing unique antioxidants,  vitamin B, vitamin E, and a good balance of essential fatty acids.  

Serving Suggestions; These oats make a very creamy and delicious porridge and are great in apple crumbles, granolas and muesli's. To make a deliciously creamy raw breakfast smoothie, soak oats for approx. 20mins beforehand.

name: Biodynamic Rain-Fed Brown Rice
description:
It is said that the ancestors of the Miao people of Sichuan, China, without any seed to sow their fields, set free a green bird which flew up to the rice granary of the heaven god and returned with the heavenly rice seed. Deliciously nutty, this Rain-Fed Brown Rice is grown by Brett and Karen Slater in NSW using certified biodynamic farming practises and requiring only natural rainfall; truly healthy, sustainable and delicious. A heavenly food. 

Biodynamic Rain-Fed Brown Rice also retains  the Vitamin B that other rice lacks, and contains high levels of manganese, phosphorous, selenium, magnesium, zinc, iron, calcium and fibre. 

Please note; we have every size available for the Rain-Fed Brown Rice except the 5kg package.

To cook; Add 1 cup of rice to a saucepan. Add 1 1/2 cups of cold water. Bring to the boil, stirring occasionally. Reduce heat and simmer covered for 25 to 30 minutes. Remove from heat and stand for 5-10 minutes.

name: Biodynamic Raw Almonds
description:
Please note ~ our Biodynamic Almonds are currently out of stock. In the meantime we have beautiful organic Australian almonds.

In Greek mythology the almond tree is represented by the beautiful princess Phyliss. Waiting for her Beloved Demophons’ return, she died of a broken heart and the gods transformed her into an almond tree, a symbol of hope. On Demophons return he embraced the tree and on pressing it to his heart, it burst into bloom, a demonstration of immortal love. 

Part of the rose family and closely related to the peach, these Biodynamic Raw Almonds have a rich and beautifully sweet buttery flavour. Grown on a biodynamic almond orchard in Nangiloc Victoria on pastures in conversion to biodynamic agriculture, these Raw Almonds are a rich source of vitamin E, calcium, phosphorous, iron and magnesium. Regarded as the king of nuts, they contain the most nutrients in comparison to all other nuts.

Serving suggestions; Eat directly or soak overnight. They can be added to any almond recipe and make a delcious almond milk.

name: Organic Raw Cacao Nibs
description:
Organic Raw Cacao Nibs are the bits of the whole Cacao bean, which is botanically actually a nut, that remain when the outer shell is removed. This is the unadulterated pure essence and basis of all chocolate and is the stage before the nut can then be ground and pressed into pure Cacao Butter and Cacao Powder.

These Organic Raw Cacao Nibs are an original heirloom criollo amazonico Cacao grown using traditional agricultural methods by indigenous growers in the native forests of Peru. 

They are a rich source of antioxidants, magnesium and essential minerals and nutrients.

Serving suggestions: perfect as a snack and in trail mixes, granola and desserts.

Produce of Peru

name: Organic Raw White Mulberries
description:
It was under the White Mulberry tree where the two lovers Pyramus and Thisbe met in secret after being forbidden to wed and there together they died.
 
Native to China, the White Mulberry tree was anciently revered as the tree of life with various parts of the tree having potent medicinal purposes.

These organic Raw White Mulberries are grown  in Turkey where they are harvested traditionally by being shaken from the tree and dried in the sun to retain and optimise all of their goodness.

They burst with a beautiful sweet caramel-like flavour and are an excellent source of antioxidants, calcium, iron, protein, magnesium and potassium.

Serving suggestions: perfect as a snack and in granolas, trail-mixes, smoothies and desserts.

Product of Turkey

name: Organic Goji Berries
description:
These certified Organic Raw Goji Berries are wild harvested in the pristine remote region around the Jinsixia National Forest Park in China and are sacred to the people of this area. In terms of overall nutrition, they are unmatched by any other food. They contain 18 kinds of essential amino acids including all 8 essential amino acids, 21 trace minerals, 500 times the vitamin C, by weight, than oranges, vitamin B1, B2, B6 and vitamin E, among other rich nutritional properties. 

A festival is held every year by the people of this remote region to honour and celebrate the life giving qualities of the goji berry.

Serving suggestions; Eat directly from the pack or add them to your favourite cereal, trail mix, juice or smoothie. Recommended daily intake is 10 grams, which is approximately one handful.

name: Organic Shredded Coconut
description:
Organic Shredded Coconut is derived from the fruit of ripe organic coconuts from the coconut palm tree. In the tropics, the coconut palm is known as the Tree of Life and is one of natures wonders, with every part of the tree being beneficial in some way. 

This beautifully delicious Organic Shredded Coconut that you hold in your hands is the best we could find and is grown in certified organic conditions in Mexico.

Shredded coconut is a source of calcium, iron and selenium and is rich in fibre, healthy fat and lauric acid (which is antifungal and antimicrobial). 

To Eat; Very versatile, organic shredded coconut can be used in a variety of dishes and is great in granolas, smoothies, desserts, chocolate recipes, trailmixes and as a garnish.

name: Organic Raw Cacao Powder
description:
Organic Raw Cacao Powder is the pure unadulterated essence of chocolate. 

Made from an heirloom variety of certified organic unroasted Criollo Amazonica Cacao, grown in the Amazon rainforest of Peru, this Raw Organic Cacao Powder is jam packed with antioxidants, magnesium, iron, zinc, calcium and a vast array of rich nutrients.

Theobroma Cacao, its’ Latin name, translates literally to “Cacao, Food of the Gods”. Godlike in its nature, Organic Raw Cacao Powder is a true superfood and is the highest wholefood source of magnesium and antioxidants 
in the world. 

Serving suggestions; Mix a tablespoon (or to taste) with your favourite smoothie or recipe for a rich and decadent chocolate taste.
